#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define gc getchar
#define pc putchar
int m , n , a[101] , b[101] , val[101][101] ;

inline int minstep(int aa,int bb)
{
    if(val[aa][bb] + 1) return val[aa][bb] ;
    if(aa>=m)           return val[aa][bb] = n-bb+1 ;
    if(bb>=n)           return val[aa][bb] = m-aa+1 ;
    if(a[aa] == b[bb] ) return val[aa][bb] = minstep(aa+1,bb+1);
    return val[aa][bb] = 1 + min ( minstep(aa+1,bb) , min(minstep(aa+1,bb+1) , minstep(aa,bb+1)));
}

int main()
{

    int _t , i ;
    scanf("%d",&_t);
    while(_t--)
    {
        cin >> m ;
        for(i = 0 ; i < m ; ++i)
            cin >> a[i] ;
        cin >> n ;
        for(i = 0 ; i < n ; ++i)
            cin >> b[i] ;
        memset(val,-1,sizeof(val));
        cout << minstep(0,0) - 1 << endl ;
    }
    return 0;
}
